alert.note: Alert for Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 24 at 9:09PM MDT until April 25 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow, heavy at times. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Feet, Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000 Feet and Teller County/Rampart Range Above 7500 Feet/Pikes Peak Between 7500 and 11000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft
